review_text: Best design on the lake! This home was beautiful and better than the photos even. The location was peaceful and private. The property manager was helpful and responsive. Would definitely stay here again. Just a fabulous property!

very nice place we will visit again

This is a really nice place to stay. It‚Äôs our second time now and we will keep coming back. Everything is clean, simple and very comfortable! Thanks!!

One night, after 11:30pm, the smoke alarm started going off and we had to contact the management - who was extremely responsive! However, just to the left of Manor Oak is a neighbor who sells bigger bundles at a reasonable price. The place was beautifully decorated, peaceful, and everything we hoped it to be and more. We definitely hope to return again in the future!

The lake house was very clean and exactly like the listing. The host provided helpful suggestions such as local restaurants as well as things to do and they were all wonderful. The house felt very private while not too far from neighbors so you never felt isolated. I would very much recommend this place to others.

Beautiful home! We had a wonderful time during our stay here! Everything that you could possibly need is available to you at this home. They have thought of everything‚Ä¶ fully stocked kitchen with beautiful countertops, glorious screened in porch, extra large back porch, windows that open from the kitchen to the screened in porch, exquisite master bathroom/shower, fire pit, nice dock with kayaks, detailed instructions, new washer/dryer, large flat screen tvs, etc. An extra bonus to this home is the fabulous ‚Äúboat house‚Äù that has a pool table, four extra beds, bathroom/shower, large flat screen tv, games, etc. The host was very friendly and responsive as well. We had the most incredible time! The house was beautiful and the layout was great for hanging out with a large group.

This rental was phenomenal. Beautiful. So tastefully decorated. Welcoming. Refreshing. Many places to relax -- conversation on the back screened porch or on the dock or around the fire pit. Exceptional home! Clean, beautiful decor, responsive host, near Toccoa Falls.

Highly recommend! The place was a very private and nice place to get away for a couple of days. Would definitely recommend and come back!!
This was the perfect getaway location with plenty to do and more than helpful host!
everything was great! best airbnb we've ever had :-)

Lastly, I think it's worth mentioning that when I had two questions (before check-in and making the host aware of a minor issue), they were extremely responsive and helpful. Well done from top to bottom.
Thank you

We absolutely LOVED our stay. There was more than enough supplies like toilet paper, dishwasher tabs, towels, etc. We were a group of 4 adults, 1 ten month old, 2 eight year olds, and 1 eleven year old. We had also reached out to see if they had a pack-n-play for a ten month old and they bought one specifically for our stay to keep at the space. The communication was excellent. Reach out if you have questions or needs and they will likely accommodate. Amazing stay!

Wonderful time! Everything was perfect.

If at anytime we needed something, he was a click away. Although we brought our own seasonings and some kitchen items we thought we couldn't live without, none was necessary as this home's kitchen was completely stocked from seasonings to blenders. Would stay in this home over and over again. Perfect place for 10-13 people. The house is beautifully appointed, very well stocked, gorgeous private setting and was just what we wanted to celebrate our daughters UGA graduation! One of our all time favorite Airbnbs!!

My friends and I really enjoyed this property! We went to the local spots and enjoyed the remote, peaceful area. The hosts were really kind and helpful for any issues we had during our stay!

It was not difficult to arrive, the instructions were clear, and the check in was easy. The dock was magical and fun! We loved the way the beds were organized and it was easy to distribute the families accordingly. All in all, we would definitely come back! Book NOW!

This is a beautifully appointed home with all the boxes checked. Great kitchen for cooking, nice views out the back, great bedding and game room. Highly recommend.

Beautiful home
